title: Blood gene signals reveal Parkinson’s risk years before diagnosis - News-Medical
summary_full: Blood gene signals reveal Parkinson’s risk years before diagnosis  News-Medical4 Parkinson’s disease symptoms that can show up decades before a diagnosis  The Washington PostEarly Parkinson’s could be detected decades before symptoms with simple blood test  Fox NewsMany people think a tremor is the hallmark warning sign of Parkinson’s disease.
